Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Thread
    controller to control the other threads and start dynamically more worker-threads, restarts also the crawler if it has been shut down
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Holger Ebhart
